thread.title: Comment on VIDEOS: Berkeley March 4 Trump Rally Violence & Fights by Anonymous
thread.title_full: Comment on VIDEOS: Berkeley March 4 Trump Rally Violence & Fights by Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Comment on VIDEOS: Berkeley March 4 Trump Rally Violence & Fights by Anonymous
text:
‚Äî Mike Kohn (@MikeCKohn) March 4, 2017 
Videos circulated on social media of fighting and other unrest at the Berkeley, California ‚ÄúMarch4Trump‚Äù rally on March 4. 
Donald Trump opponents headed to the rally and clashed with Trump supporters. Punches were flown, firecrackers ignited, hats burned, and police made arrests. RT lizziejohnsonnn: Here we go again. Not the first fight that's broken out at the #trump rally in #Berkeley . pic.twitter.com/vP0NLgSPqD 
‚Äî Anonymous Morpheus (@anony_morph) March 5, 2017 
The ‚ÄúMarch4Trump‚Äù rallies occurred throughout the country on March 4. Thousands of Donald Trump supporters gathered in states and cities ‚Äì including in Berkeley ‚Äì across the country to participate in #March4Trump rallies, also called #SpiritofAmerica Rallies. The March 4 Trump rallies were meant to give people a place to express their support for the president. You can read a roundup of the ‚ÄúMarch4Trump‚Äù rallies around the country here. 
However, in Berkeley, things quickly started getting out of hand. Firecrackers, blood, smoke, in the streets of #berkeley #March4Trump pic.twitter.com/OZhMKVGKBZ 
‚Äî Aaron Davis (@BaronBavis) March 4, 2017 There's a moving blob of fistfights here. Saw an American Flag on a pole swinging around at #march4trump in #berkeley pic.twitter.com/jLMzgjU9aQ 
‚Äî Aaron Davis (@BaronBavis) March 4, 2017 Anti-trump protestors now attempting to surround and block Berkeley #March4Trump from going to UC Berkeley pic.twitter.com/Vz9bAl3u7M 
‚Äî Mike Kohn (@MikeCKohn) March 4, 2017 
Videos and photos circulated on social media of fights and people being pepper sprayed. There was a report of an elderly man being pepper sprayed. An elderly man was just pepper sprayed by ANTIFA in Berkeley!!! https://t.co/c1F12jDZGy pic.twitter.com/qu1KhEzpkR 
‚Äî Eric G. Elinow (@eelinow) March 4, 2017 
Photos circulated of bloody protesters. A number of bloodied protesters. Allston way closed down. pic.twitter.com/2bWDt9aq9E 
‚Äî Aaron Davis (@BaronBavis) March 4, 2017 
People burned hats. 
‚Äî Aaron Davis (@BaronBavis) March 4, 2017 Hat burning. The fights are increasing in frequency at #March4Trump in #berkeley pic.twitter.com/DF43YD3RBR 
‚Äî Aaron Davis (@BaronBavis) March 4, 2017 
People set off firecrackers during the melee. Crowd splits after protrump forces spray pepper spray, anti-trump supporters respond with fire crackers pic.twitter.com/a8SMzCNo94 
‚Äî Mike Kohn (@MikeCKohn) March 4, 2017 
Police started making arrests. 
‚Äî Mike Kohn (@MikeCKohn) March 5, 2017 
Some people hid their faces. More people hiding their faces. #berkeleyprotests pic.twitter.com/tgeBAvACuf 
‚Äî Berkeleyside (@berkeleyside) March 4, 2017 
One report said there were ‚Äúscattered fights‚Äù throughout the area as Trump supporters and opponents mixed. Counter protesters at #March4Trump headed west on Center lane now. Seems like the whole area is scattered fights atm pic.twitter.com/EKBmC951tv 
‚Äî Aaron Davis (@BaronBavis) March 4, 2017 
Here are more videos and photos from the scene: Man arrested. Wearing jacket that says "basket of deplorables texas chapter" #March4Trump #berkeley @XpressNews pic.twitter.com/UXp7FIZ08J 
‚Äî Audrey Garces (@AudreyGarces) March 5, 2017 when you represent #march4trump in #Berkeley but your bladder betrays you üí¶‚ùÑÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/naHCfz1AQt
